text: te'ona vadhare padata gupta sucanomam ko'i bhala'i nathi, ham bhala'i te'ona salahasucanomam che je'o dana karavamam athava satkaryamam tatha lokomam melapa karavano adesa ape, ane je vyakti phakata allaha ta'alani prasannata icchata a karya kare tene ame cokkasapane khuba ja pramanamam phala apisum
